inclusion.criterion: parkinsonism or unaffected subject at risk
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: first degree family member with parkinsonism

inclusion.criterion: healthy volunteers and control subjects matched for age, gender and handedness
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: severe cognitive deficits impairing decision making
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: unable or medically unsafe to withdraw from current medications
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no SSRIs and other psychoactive drugs mentioned

exclusion.criterion: history of neurologic conditions such as stroke or focal brain lesion
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no history of stroke or focal brain lesion mentioned

exclusion.criterion: cannot lie on his/her back for a prolonged period of time
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has itchy foot with localized scaling and maceration, but no underlying disease such as DM. He smokes and drinks moderately.
